author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Tamil Maanlia Congress will decide on alliance for the ensuing Assembly election by this month end, party leader S.R. Balasubramaniyon said in Coimbatore on Tuesday.

At a press meet, he said the party leader G.K. Vasan was in the process of identifying the constituencies the party could contest and win. “Already, he has toured 170 constituencies. Once he completes the tour, he will decide on the alliance.”

At present, the political situation in the State was fluid as many parties were yet to forge alliances. The TMC was studying the situation closely and would take the decision by month-end, he said.
title: TMC to decide on alliance by month-end: SRB
